channel.title: Akka on mostlymaths.net
channel.description: Recent content in Akka on mostlymaths.net

item.title: 2019-9 Readings of the week (x4)
item.description: You know how you slip once on a habit and everything goes crazy? Well, I’ve been 4 weeks without writing these, so here’s the accumulated reading from 4 weeks. Because, even if I don’t write it, I read a lot anyway. Also, there’s lot of interesting content this “week”.

item.title: ClassNotFoundException for Akka logging
item.description: A few months ago I stumbled into the problem of Akka logging, specifically ClassNotFoundException when using akka.event.slf4j.Slf4jLoggingFilter, just by following the details of the Logging - SL4J section of Akka documentation.
